name: Agents Against Chaos
description: In the desert city of Roanapour, five buildings eclipse the outer rim of the city. They’ve all become possessed hive minds of demon activity, and it’s up to you, as a member of the agents against chaos, to purge these buildings and save the city. Play as Lucy or Gerald, and shoot your way through the first floor of the first building. Blast your way through fiery enemies, and try to survive.
